title: ToTok, Part 1: How to Convince Someone to Download Spyware
description: Only a few months after its release, ToTok - an ordinary messaging app, with no exceptional features - had over five million downloads,  and held the number 4 position in Apple's App Store global charts. So what was it that made ToTok so popular, so quickly? The answer: nothing good.
content:encoded: Only a few months after its release, ToTok – an ordinary messaging app, with no exceptional features – had over five million downloads, and held the number 4 position in Apple’s App Store global charts. So what was it that made ToTok so popular, so quickly? The answer: nothing good.
